properties.Description: The base class for a backup policy. Workload-specific backup policies are derived from this class.

protectedItemsCount.Description: The number of items associated with this policy.

schedulePolicy.Description: The base class for backup schedules.

retentionPolicy.Description: The base class for retention policy.

backupManagementType.Description: Azure VM (also known as IaaS VM) workload-specific backup policy.

scheduleRunFrequency.Description: Defines the frequency interval (daily or weekly) for the schedule policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Daily', 'Weekly'

scheduleRunDays.Description: This list is the days of the week when the schedule runs.

scheduleRunTimes.Description: List of times, during a day, when the schedule runs.

scheduleWeeklyFrequency.Description: The number of times per week the schedule runs.

count.Description:
Count of the duration types. Retention duration is determined by the combining the Count times and durationType. 
   For example, if Count = 3 and durationType = Weeks, then the retention duration is three weeks.

durationType.Description: The retention duration type of the retention policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Days', 'Weeks', 'Months', 'Years'

retentionTimes.Description: The retention times of retention policy.

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of the days of the week for the weekly retention policy.

retentionTimes.Description: Retention times of the retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format type for monthly retention policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Daily', 'Weekly'

retentionTimes.Description: Retention times of the retention policy.

daysOfTheMonth.Description: List of days of the month.

daysOfTheWeek.Description: List of days of the week.

weeksOfTheMonth.Description: List of weeks of the month.

retentionScheduleFormatType.Description: Retention schedule format for the yearly retention policy. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'Daily', 'Weekly'

monthsOfYear.Description: List of the months of year for the yearly retention policy.

retentionTimes.Description: Retention times for the retention policy.

schedulePolicy.Description: The base class for backup schedules.

retentionPolicy.Description: The base class for retention policy.

backupManagementType.Description: The backup policy for the file or folder container.

retentionPolicy.Description: The base class for retention policy.

backupManagementType.Description: The Azure SQL workload-specific backup policy.

properties.Description: The base class for backup items.

backupManagementType.Description: The backup management type associated with the backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql'

workloadType.Description: The workload type for this item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'VM', 'FileFolder', 'AzureSqlDb', 'SQLDB', 'Exchange', 'Sharepoint', 'DPMUnknown'

sourceResourceId.Description: The ID of the resource to be backed up.

policyId.Description: The ID of the backup policy associated with this backup item.

lastRecoveryPoint.Description: The timestamp when the most recent backup copy was created for this backup item.

friendlyName.Description: The friendly name of the VM represented by this backup item.

virtualMachineId.Description: The fully qualified Resource Manager ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

protectionStatus.Description: The backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.Description: The backup state of this backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

lastBackupStatus.Description: The last backup operation status. The possible values are: Healthy or Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.Description: The timestamp of the last backup operation for this backup item.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for the Azure VM (also known as IaaS VM)-specific backup item.

protectedItemType.Description: This Azure VM workload-specific (also known as IaaS VM workload-specific) backup item has been backed up.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this backup item.

recoveryPointCount.Description: The number of backup copies available for this backup item.

policyInconsistent.Description: Specifies if the backup policy associated with the backup item is inconsistent.

friendlyName.Description: The friendly name of this backup item.

computerName.Description: The name of the computer associated with this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.Description: The status of last backup operation.

protectionState.Description: The states for this property are: Protected, ProtectionStopped, IRPending, or ProtectionError.

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for the backup item.

protectedItemType.Description: This is a file or folder workload-specific backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.Description: The last day and time the agent synced with the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: The number of backup copies associated with the backup item.

protectedItemDataId.Description: The internal ID of a backup item. The internal ID is used by the Azure SQL Backup engine to contact Recovery Services.

protectionState.Description: The backup state of the backup item. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'IRPending', 'Protected', 'ProtectionError', 'ProtectionStopped', 'ProtectionPaused'

extendedInfo.Description: Additional information for the Azure SQL specific backup item.

protectedItemType.Description: This is an Azure SQL workload-specific backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.Description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.Description: The number of available backup copies for this backup item.

policyState.Description: The state of the backup policy associated with this backup item.
